price: Sọ pé: “Ẹ máa retí. Dájúdájú èmi náà wà pẹ̀lú yín nínú àwọn olùretí.
arabic: قُلۡ تَرَبَّصُواْ فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُتَرَبِّصِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qul tarabbaṣū fa-innī maʿakum mina al-mutarabiṣīna
